traits.name: Metal Immunity
entries: The lava child can move through metal without hindrance, and it has advantage on attack rolls against any creature wearing metal armor or using a metal shield.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The lava child makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
